channel.title: How to Get your Server on the "Sponsered Server" list
channel.description:
Hello, my name is Linkey, and I would like my 508 server to go on the "Sponsered Servers" list in the MoparScape Server Status Page. First of all, I cannot even post my server because I do not think the Server Status page reads 508 servers, meanwhile Ploxagescape HD is a 508 and it reads their server. I think it is because only "Sponsered Servers" sponser 508 servers. To add to this, I dont know how to get one of these "SPonsered Servers."
Please Help, Contact me at - tgpn1996@gmail.com

item.title: How to Get your Server on the "Sponsered Server" list
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

Bandos_Pk:

No, they sponser 317’s just it costs $30’s a month.

or more lol

Read full topic
